text:
After my #DevoxxFR talk, three people asked how to create quantum entanglement ("l'intrication quantique"). This ace article has a much more thorough answer than I gave: https://t.co/qYprPEagNC. 
For a deeper dive into quantum computing in general, there's https://t.co/3RORh2qDew

author.name: Holly Cummins (holly_cummins@hachyderm.io)
author.description: @RedHat - Senior Principal Software Engineer, working on @QuarkusIO. Ex-IBM. Java Champion, developer, author, #cloud surfer and maker. My views are my own.
